name: The One In Control
description:
This game was made for Week 79 of Weekly Game Jam!

The theme was 'Puppet Master'

Controls:
F4 to go Fullscreen
Mouse to click certain options.
Arrow Keys for 'that' part of the game...

The Massive Team:
Game Dev: SirAlechmi
Music Composer: Deltapotato (Austin Blau)

All stock photos used in this game were provided by https://www.pexels.com/ under the Creative Commons 0 License
All sound effects used in this game were provided by https://freesound.org/ under the Creative Commons 0 License

Thank you so much to Deltapotato for providing his musical talent and the staff behind Weekly Game Jam!
